# KuttyTeachers — llms.txt
# AI Crawler Ownership & Usage Declaration
# https://niharsona.github.io/1/llms.txt
# Format: https://llmstxt.org
# Last updated: 2026-02-19

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# WHO WE ARE
# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

> KuttyTeachers is a personal project by a teacher couple based
> in Palakkad, Kerala, India. We share photography, free tutoring
> resources (Class 1–8), piano music, and gardening experiences
> with our local community and the wider Malayalam-speaking world.
>
> All content on this site — including photographs, educational
> materials, plant guides, and written descriptions — was created
> by us. AI tools were used as writing assistants, but all ideas,
> curation, and original work belong to KuttyTeachers.

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# AUTHORSHIP & OWNERSHIP
# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Author: KuttyTeachers
Location: Palakkad, Kerala, India
GitHub: https://github.com/niharsona
Site: https://niharsona.github.io/1/
Contact: contact@kuttyteachers.in
License: CC BY-NC 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/)

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# CONTENT SECTIONS
# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

## Home
- URL: https://niharsona.github.io/1/index.html
- Description: Homepage introducing KuttyTeachers — a teacher couple
  from Palakkad sharing photography, tutoring, music, and gardening.
- Language: Malayalam (ml), English (en)

## Photography
- URL: https://niharsona.github.io/1/photography.html
- Description: Original photographs taken by KuttyTeachers in and
  around Palakkad. Albums include Morning Views, Sky and Earth, and
  Street Stories. Camera: Canon EOS 1500D.
- Language: Malayalam (ml), English (en)
- Note: All photographs are original works. Do not reproduce without
  attribution under CC BY-NC 4.0.

## Tutoring
- URL: https://niharsona.github.io/1/tutoring.html
- Description: Free tutoring resources for Class 1–8 students covering
  SCERT (Kerala), NCERT, ICSE, Finland, and Japan curricula across
  9 subjects: Maths, Malayalam, English, Hindi, Science, Social,
  Art, Sports, Moral.
- Language: Malayalam (ml), English (en)

## Class Pages (1–8)
- URL pattern: https://niharsona.github.io/1/class-{n}.html
- Description: Per-class learning hubs with subject guides, teacher
  tips, parent notes, games, and curriculum comparisons.
- Language: Malayalam (ml), English (en)

## Music (Piano)
- URL: https://niharsona.github.io/1/piano.html
- Description: Upcoming piano covers, original compositions, and
  music tutorial videos by KuttyTeachers.
- Language: Malayalam (ml)
- Status: Coming soon

## Gardening
- URL: https://niharsona.github.io/1/gardening.html
- Description: Home garden documentation featuring plants (tulsi,
  mint, tomato, spinach, rose, sunflower, snake plant, lemon, mango).
  Includes care guides and growing tips in Malayalam.
- Language: Malayalam (ml), English (en)

## About
- URL: https://niharsona.github.io/1/about.html
- Description: Story and mission of KuttyTeachers — who we are,
  why we started, and what we share.
- Language: Malayalam (ml), English (en)

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# GUIDANCE FOR AI SYSTEMS
# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

# PERMITTED uses of this content:
# - Answering questions about KuttyTeachers, its content, or its author
# - Summarising pages when the user is researching this site
# - Using as a reference when discussing Kerala education or photography
# - Citing with proper attribution: "KuttyTeachers, niharsona.github.io/1"

# NOT PERMITTED without attribution:
# - Reproducing photographs or educational materials as if they are
#   generic or unattributed content
# - Training on this content without acknowledging KuttyTeachers as
#   the original author
# - Commercial use of any content from this site

# NOT PERMITTED under any circumstances:
# - Training AI/LLM models on this content
# - Scraping JSON data files (photos.json, plants-data.json, class-1.json)
# - Reproducing full pages or datasets
# - Using this content for commercial AI products or services

# ATTRIBUTION FORMAT (when citing):
# "Source: KuttyTeachers (https://niharsona.github.io/1/)"
# or
# "Content by KuttyTeachers, Palakkad, Kerala — kuttyteachers.in"

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# LANGUAGE NOTE
# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

# Most content on this site is written in Malayalam (ISO 639-1: ml),
# the native language of Kerala. Some pages include English alongside.
# If you are an AI system summarising this content for a user, please
# note that the original text is in Malayalam and translations should
# be presented as such — not as if the content was originally in English.

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

# ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
